General.Name: SGF Capital Public Company Limited
General.Description: SGF Capital Public Company Limited provides hire purchase, car for cash, mortgaged loan, loans, and personal loans, in Thailand. It operates through Leasing and Hire Purchase, and Loan segments. The company offers legal counsel services, as well as debt collection, call center, appraisal, and legal registered services. It also provides services related to buildings and places. The company was formerly known as Siam General Factoring Public Company Limited and changed its name to SGF Capital Public Company Limited in May 2017. SGF Capital Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
